page.shortlink: api objects array last appended method

return.name: index
return.description: Returns the index of the last appended array element.

page.description: The value of the last appended index.

discussion.p: The *[xb:<array>.last_appended()]* method returns the index of the element that was last appended to a dynamic array.

page.example:
arr[] = "a"
? arr.last_appended() = 1
arr[] = "b" arr[] = "c" arr[] = "d"
? arr.last_appended() = 4
